summary: Keeps Player Damage at 1x on Difficulties greater than Easy.
descriptionHtml:
A forum user at UESP.net was saying how Legendary doesn\'t make things any harder, just longer since the damage multipliers of the PC go down as the difficulty goes up. Instead he suggested the PC multipliers should stay at 1 while the enemies\' multipliers continue to go up. All this mod does is keep the player\'s damage multiplier at 1x on difficulties greater than Easy.

PC Damage Mulitipliers with Mod:
Novice - 2x
Apprentice - 1.5x
Adept - 1x
Expert - 1x
Master - 1x
Legendary - 1x

Enemy Damage Multipliers Are The Same as in Vanilla:
Novice - .5x
Apprentice - .75x
Adept - 1x
Expert - 1.5x
Master - 2x
Legendary - 2.5x

Thanks goes out to KryptonianBlood for the idea!
author: Musicman247
